turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to order a cafe latte from Peet's Coffee in the Peet's Coffee at 124 North Larchmont Boulevard in Los Angeles, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me place that order for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a medium caffe latte with whole milk to be picked up at the petes on 124 north largemont in los angeles, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
